meta.importance: Widely watched patterns create self-fulfilling prophecies
meta.note: Combine with volume and other indicators for best results

identification.head: Rally to higher peak
identification.right_shoulder: Rally to peak similar to left shoulder
identification.neckline: Line connecting lows between shoulders and head

head_and_shoulders.confirmation: Break and close below neckline with volume
head_and_shoulders.target_calculation: Distance from head to neckline, projected below neckline

identification.head: Decline to lower low
identification.right_shoulder: Decline to low similar to left shoulder
identification.neckline: Line connecting highs between shoulders and head

inverse_head_and_shoulders.confirmation: Break and close above neckline with volume
inverse_head_and_shoulders.target_calculation: Distance from head to neckline, projected above neckline

double_top.identification: Two peaks at approximately same level
double_top.target: Distance from peaks to valley, projected below valley
double_top.volume_behavior: Lower volume on second peak = stronger signal

double_bottom.identification: Two lows at approximately same level
double_bottom.target: Distance from lows to peak, projected above peak
double_bottom.volume_behavior: Higher volume on second low = stronger signal

ascending_triangle.confirmation: Close above flat resistance with volume
ascending_triangle.target: Height of triangle base, projected from breakout
ascending_triangle.volume_pattern: Declining during formation, spike on breakout

descending_triangle.confirmation: Close below flat support with volume
descending_triangle.target: Height of triangle base, projected from breakout
descending_triangle.volume_pattern: Declining during formation, spike on breakdown

symmetrical_triangle.identification: Converging trendlines - higher lows AND lower highs
symmetrical_triangle.target: Widest part of triangle, projected from breakout
symmetrical_triangle.late_breakout: If breaks near apex, less reliable

rising_wedge.identification: Both trendlines rising, converging (higher lows, higher highs but narrowing)
rising_wedge.volume_pattern: Declining volume during rise = stronger signal

falling_wedge.identification: Both trendlines falling, converging (lower highs, lower lows but narrowing)
falling_wedge.volume_pattern: Declining volume during fall = stronger signal

bull_flag.target: Length of flagpole, projected from breakout
bull_flag.volume_pattern: High on flagpole, low during flag, surge on breakout

bear_flag.target: Length of flagpole, projected from breakdown
bear_flag.volume_pattern: High on flagpole, low during flag, surge on breakdown

pennant.target: Length of pole, projected from breakout
pennant.volume_pattern: High on pole, declining in pennant, surge on breakout

rectangle.identification: Price oscillates between parallel support and resistance
rectangle.confirmation: Break of support or resistance with volume
rectangle.target: Height of rectangle, projected from breakout

cup_and_handle.target: Depth of cup, projected from breakout
cup_and_handle.volume_pattern: Lower in cup, declining in handle, surge on breakout

pattern_trading_guidelines.volume_is_critical: Pattern without volume confirmation has 30%+ higher failure rate
pattern_trading_guidelines.wait_for_confirmation: Don't anticipate - wait for actual break
pattern_trading_guidelines.measure_targets: Use pattern height for target calculation
pattern_trading_guidelines.context_matters: Pattern in trend direction more reliable
pattern_trading_guidelines.failed_patterns: When pattern fails, often strong move opposite direction

pattern_at_round_number.note: Pattern breakout at major round number strengthens signal

best_practices.stop_logical: Stop inside pattern or at pattern boundary
